mapper.insert: insert into custinfo ( custno, invtp, invnm, sex, idtp, idno, mobileno, email, custst, passwd, lastlogintime, passwderr, opendt, updatetimestamp, tradepwd) values ( #{custno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{invtp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{invnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idtp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobileno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{custst,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{passwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, null, #{passwderr,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{opendt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, systimestamp, #{tradepwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, )

insert into custinfo ( custno, invtp, invnm, sex, idtp, idno, mobileno, email, custst, passwd, lastlogintime, passwderr, opendt, updatetimestamp, tradepwd) values ( #{custno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{invtp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{invnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idtp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobileno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{custst,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{passwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, null, #{passwderr,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{opendt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, systimestamp, #{tradepwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, )
